OrgName.entry: OPEN COLLEGE NETWORK, YORKSHIRE AND HUMBER REGION

Desc.entry: Awarding body primarily targeting aspects of learning that have not previously been recognised. Sizeable proportion of work is involved with providing accreditation for courses run by the voluntary sector (eg Step Up, New Diploma, MaTReC, Pre-School Learning Alliance etc). Also works with further education colleges, schools and prisons. Credits can then be used by individuals to progress to further and higher education. Serves Yorkshire and Humberside.

category.entry: EDUCATION - TRAINING PROVIDERS AND EMPLOYMENT SUPPORT
